DOC.criteria: Histologically confirm adenocarcinoma within 180 day registration History & Physical Exam , include digital rectal exam ( DRE ) , within 8 wks prior registration Histologic evaluation prostate biopsy LLUMC , Gleason score assignment Clinical stage , Tumor Stage ( T1T2C ) Prostatic Specific Angigen ( PSA ) less 10 ng.ml within 180 day prior registration Prior concurrent invasive malignancy Evidence distant metastasis
